Package Cafe

Class Coffee

java.lang.Object
Cafe.MenuItem
Cafe.Coffee
All Implemented Interfaces:
Customizable
public class Coffee
extends MenuItem
implements Customizable
Coffee class creates instances of menuItems that are specific to Coffee Coffee is customizable with add-ins and have different sizes/prices
